byline.contributor: Saeed Al-Batati contributed reporting from Al Mukalla, Yemen, and Shuaib Almosawa from Sana, Yemen.

abstract: Doctors Without Borders reports that Saudi-led airstrikes on residential area of Taiz in southwestern Yemen, ostensibly aimed at Houthi insurgents, have killed more than 65 civilians.
lead_paragraph: The medical charity reported what could be one of the largest death tolls from the Saudi-led airstrikes in Yemen.

headline.main: Airstrikes Kill Dozens of Civilians in Yemen, Doctors Without Borders Says
headline.print_headline: Airstrikes Kill Dozens of Civilians in Yemen, Aid Group Says

snippet: The medical charity reported what could be one of the largest death tolls from the Saudi-led airstrikes in Yemen.
